About: rights in Aurora says ""Any applicable privacy policies for this product should be listed here."  This sentence seems like either it should have a link to the actual privacy policies for the word "here", or contain them, but just saying that they should be there does not seem helpful.

Screenshot attached.

comments.text:
Should we update this sentence to a more helpful one?
i.e. Should we replace it with a more descriptive sentence so people modifying about:rights for their customized builds will notice it.
This maybe also a good idea to people using Aurora and Nightly (like me) don't get confused:

"Oh man, this thing does not have any Privacy Policy?"

:)
